remarks: A finite product with a zero term is zero.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprod0.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprod0.kc $e |- F/_ k C $.
fprod0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprod0.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprod0.bc $e |- ( k = K -> B = C ) $.
fprod0.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. A ) $.
fprod0.c $e |- ( ph -> C = 0 ) $.
fprod0 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = 0 ) $.
$d A k $.
$d K k $.
